explains: v. 敲诈（racketeer 的 ing 形式）；对……进行勒索

sentences.en: Edwards was indicted on racketeering charges but never convicted.
sentences.cn: 爱德华兹被指控犯敲诈罪但从未被判有罪。

sentences.en: Prosecutors may soon seek an indictment on racketeering and fraud charges.
sentences.cn: 检察官们可能很快就会以敲诈勒索和欺骗罪进行起诉。

sentences.en: Less than a week earlier the city got its first anti-racketeering association.
sentences.cn: 不到一星期前，马勒莫城也成立了反敲诈勒索联盟协会。
